"Yeah, I got all of him, unfortunently." Sinesis said, taking Blizzard's ha=
nd and trying to get up. He is unable and he hits himself in the face...
  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups=
.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 4:43 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

=

  *Blizzard bends down* Blizzard: Do you have all of Sinister? *Blizzard s=
ays to Sinesis*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To=

    Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 4:04 AM
    Subject: =
Re: Neo Beast Wars


    "Fine, but don't be surprised if I kill you!" Sine=
sis said to Blizzard, coughing a few times.

    "Ah, never mind that last =
sentence, I need help, too." Sinesis said...
      ----- Original Message -=
---- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent=
: Thursday, July 13, 2000 12:36 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    =
  *Blizzard stopped reaching for Sinister's pieces when she saw Sinesis pic=
king his parts up* Blizzard: Please let me help... *Blizzard says to Sinesi=
s*
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, July 13, 2000 12:14 AM
       =
 Subject: Neo Beast Wars


        Deemos helps Inzola back to their ship a=
nd he starts to repair her, but to no avail. Deemos, very hurt himself, wen=
t to the Predacon base.

        "My wife, you see she in hurt, and I need =
to use your CR Chambers, I have been told that this is the base of the migh=
ty Hell Beast, how can I help you, Hell Beast? Just heal Inzola and myself!=
" Deemos called out to Anyone in Hell Beast's base.

        Sinesis slowly=
 crawled along, pushing Sinister's parts. Sinesis stopped every mile to cat=
ch his breath, his jets her wrecked. He kept going and going and going.

  =
      Plintissa seen a letter from Dracona, saying she had retruned to base=
. Plintissa shrugged and walked along her way. Artist tripped her up and wa=
lked on ahead. Plintissa felt like crying again, this is the one she loved?=
 Artist laughed and went on his way.

        Dracona picked up the device,=
 but suddenly, the device exploded, sending a fireball into the Predacon ba=
se. (Megatron's base) Dracona gasped. She had better be going now. She slow=
ly started to sneak away.

        The Radicons hurried on their way, maybe=
 some other team would apreciate their skills, like the Alliance. Airbomber=
 just hoped that Infectra would come with them.

        Lightmare's spark =
joined the Matrix, she is DEAD.

        Gangon's spark hovered in front of=
 BrightBlade, swirling around her over and over again.
